text: Ara amara tadera diyechilama bisayati sanbandhe suspasta pramanabali, kinta tadera kache jnana asara pare'o tara matabheda kare ni nijedera madhye irsa bidbesa byatita. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu tadera madhye kiyamatera dine bicara-mimansa kare debena ye bisaye tara matabheda karata se-sanbandhe.
